description: The Mirai is a ship of a fictional Yukinami class of destroyer, which was created for the story. The fictional ships are essentially an improved version of the very real Japan Maritime Self-Defense Force Kongou class, which is a modification of the United States Navy`s Arleigh Burke class. All of these ships are equipped with the Aegis combat system that provides the vessels possessing it the capability to locate, track and target a large number of enemy vessels, aircraft and even missiles at ranges and with accuracy that was unimaginable in World War II.
name: DDG-182 Mirai
